attributes.action: Save Burma (Rohingya) Muslims! Get them the HELP they deserve!
attributes.additional_details: Did you know INNOCENT MUSLIMS in BURMA are being slaughtered, assualted, burned alive! They have done nothing wrong and are innocent helpless muslims. We need to help them out as much as possible by donating as much as we can to the charites such as muslim aid. Who are trying to help by supplying shelter, food, and attention to the innocent muslim souls of burma. So please pass on this petition and lets inform the country about this heartbreaking issue.
